h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Captain Kalpa-Wave
content: There's a Shrine at the start of the next area just beyond the entrance gate, and you can use this as the perfect opportunity to return back to the Pagoda Realm.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Captain Kalpa-Wave'.
The content is as follows:
There's a Shrine at the start of the next area just beyond the entrance gate, and you can use this as the perfect opportunity to return back to the Pagoda Realm.
